title: Have no fearFor when I'm alone

replies.msg:
I'll be better off 
Than I was before

I've got this light
I'll be around to grow
Who I was before
I cannot recall

Long nights allow 
Me to feel I'm falling
I am falling

The lights go out
Let me feel I'm falling
I am falling 
safely to the ground

I'll take this soul 
That's inside me now
Like a brand new friend
I'll forever know

I've got this life 
And the will to show
I will always be 
Better than before

Long nights allow 
Me to feel I'm falling
I am falling

The lights go out
Let me feel I'm falling
I am falling 
safely to the ground
